mapper.select: SELECT id, member_id, product_id, price, donation, delivery_fee, payment, account_num, account_name, account_bank, pay_type, receiver_addr1, receiver_addr2, receiver_addr3, receiver_tel, receiver_name, receiver_etc, state, delivery_id, delivery_number, reg_date FROM tb_order ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT count(id) FROM tb_order WHERE member_id = #{member_id}

SELECT id, member_id, product_id, price, donation, delivery_fee, payment, account_num, account_name, account_bank, pay_type, receiver_addr1, receiver_addr2, receiver_addr3, receiver_tel, receiver_name, receiver_etc, state, delivery_id, delivery_number, reg_date FROM tb_order WHERE member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT o.id, o.price, o.pay_type, o.state, o.delivery_id, o.delivery_number, DATE_FORMAT(o.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as reg_date, p.title, p.status, c.title as cate_title, m.marker_name FROM tb_order as o JOIN tb_product as p ON o.product_id = p.id JOIN tb_category as c ON p.category_id = c.id JOIN tb_maker_info as m ON m.audit_id = p.audit_id WHERE o.member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY o.id DESC

SELECT o.id, o.price, o.donation, o.delivery_fee, o.payment, o.pay_type, o.receiver_addr1, o.receiver_addr2, o.receiver_addr3, o.receiver_tel, o.receiver_name, o.receiver_etc, o.state, o.delivery_id, o.delivery_number, DATE_FORMAT(o.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as reg_date, FROM tb_order as o WHERE o.product_id = #{product_id} ORDER BY o.id DESC
SELECT count(id) as count, sum(price + donation) as sum FROM tb_order WHERE product_id = #{product_id} ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT id, member_id, product_id, price, donation, delivery_fee, payment, account_num, account_name, account_bank, pay_type, receiver_addr1, receiver_addr2, receiver_addr3, receiver_tel, receiver_name, receiver_etc, state, delivery_id, delivery_number, reg_date FROM tb_order WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_order SET member_id=#{member_id}, product_id=#{product_id}, price=#{price}, donation=#{donation}, delivery_fee=#{delivery_fee}, payment=#{payment}, account_num=#{account_num}, account_name=#{account_name}, account_bank=#{account_bank}, pay_type=1, receiver_addr1=#{receiver_addr1}, receiver_addr2=#{receiver_addr2}, receiver_addr3=#{receiver_addr3}, receiver_tel=#{receiver_tel}, receiver_name=#{receiver_name}, receiver_etc=#{receiver_etc}, state=1
